nydailynews.title: N.C. mother claims to win part of $564M Powerball jackpot
nydailynews.topComment: First Congrats! Second, Big mistake going public. I pray for your safety?

nydailynews.title: Ky. teen kills family, flees, dies in Md. shootout: cops
nydailynews.topComment: According to the Justice Department 84% of white people killed every year are killed by other white people. White lives matter, just not to 84% of white people..
